name: Freterium
headline: Real-Time Collaborative Transport Management Platform
description:
Freterium is a collaborative SaaS platform that connects organizations, people and technologies in the logistics value chain to help them move things.

Our connected cloud platform provides real-time visibility of shipments, elastic logistics infrastructure (in-house & 3rd party fleets), proprietary routing algorithms, productivity tools, and seamless collaboration that breaks down traditional organizational silos.

founders.name: Omar El Kouhene, Founder
founders.description:
Work experience

Logistics consultant & Shipping Broker
Freelance
05/2015 - 12/2018

Shipping & Supply Chain Manager
OCP Group
12/2011 - 05/2015

Consultant
McKinsey & Company
02/2011 - 10/2011

Education

Master of Engineering
CentraleSupelec
2007-2011

Maths & Info Preparatory classes
Lycee Sainte Geneviève 
2005-2007

#  Scale, Optimize, and Delight 
Next-gen TMS  Connect your ecosystem  Planning Automation 
Offer your customers an Amazon quality of service, reduce your logistics costs and focus your teams on high-impact actions. No Licensee fees. Pay as you grow [ Learn more ... ](https://www.freterium.com/</tms>)
[ See the platform ](https://www.freterium.com/</#>) [ Book a demo ](https://www.freterium.com/</request-demo/>)

# Freterium. Transport Innovation 
You believe that today's most resilient, agile, and competitive companies will be the market leaders of tomorrow. So do we. 
After the pandemic COVID-19, the world has changed. We are in a new era of supply and demand volatility. There are more and more distribution channels: Modern & traditional trade, Wholesalers, e-Commerce, Traders,... World-class distributors have no choice but to perform on all fronts. We can help you do it, easier and faster.

### [ Next-gen TMS  The Freterium platform integrates an easy-to-use cloud TMS with real-time visibility and analytics, so you can uncover opportunities for growth and cost reduction. No Licensee fees. Pay as you grow  ](https://www.freterium.com/</tms>)[ Learn more ...  ](https://www.freterium.com/</tms>) ### [ Connect your ecosystem  Live the experience of a fully connected network. Stand out from your competitors by using an unfair advantage to deliver the highest possible quality of customer service.  ](https://www.freterium.com/</advanced-visibility>)[ Learn more ...  ](https://www.freterium.com/</advanced-visibility>) ### [ Planning Automation  Automate your transport planning thanks to our configurable algorithms. Our teams will assist you to calibrate them according to your constraints and objectives. Do you think your constraints are too complex? Give us a try!  ](https://www.freterium.com/</optimization>)
##  Freterium benefits 
**Increase your team efficiency**
Let your team focus on more rewarding tasks with higher added value. Make your business the best place to work 
**Grow your business by bringing more value to your customers**
With Freterium, you can be one step ahead of the competition. Our customers are using the technology to increase their customers' sales and acquire new ones. 
**Be the most competitive in the market**
Logistics costs can make the difference for resilient companies. Reduce them by automating and optimizing your transport planning and reducing the impact of exceptions 
**Build a data-driven company**
Streamline your business by leveraging the data generated by using the solution. The companies of tomorrow are those that are data-driven 
**Join a community**
Join a community of 1000+ shippers, 3PLs, distributors, carriers, that share the same values, world-class values 
[ Book a demo ](https://www.freterium.com/</request-demo/>)

generated_description:
**Freterium Overview: A New Era in Logistics Management**

Freterium, founded in 2018 and part of Y Combinator's S21 batch, is an innovative company based in Casablanca, Morocco. The company's mission is clear: to provide a real-time collaborative transport management platform that connects organizations, individuals, and technologies in the logistics value chain.

With a lean team of 21 dedicated employees, Freterium is transforming the logistics landscape through its sophisticated SaaS platform. It offers a cloud-based infrastructure that delivers real-time visibility into shipments, integrates both in-house and third-party fleets, utilizes proprietary routing algorithms, and provides productivity tools that encourage seamless collaboration across traditional organizational silos. This approach not only streamlines transport management but also enhances overall operational efficiency.

### Key Features and Offerings:
- **Next-Gen TMS (Transport Management System)**: Freterium's platform allows companies to scale logistics operations, optimize routes, and deliver a quality of service akin to major e-commerce players like Amazon. It operates on a flexible pay-as-you-grow model without the burden of license fees.
  
- **Ecosystem Connectivity**: The platform offers businesses the capability to create a digital portal for customers and suppliers, optimizing fleet connectivity and integrating with existing ERP, WMS, and eCommerce systems.
  
- **Planning Automation**: Companies can automate transport planning using Freterium’s adjustable algorithms, which can be tailored according to specific business needs and complexity.

### Benefits:
Freterium's approach provides numerous advantages:
- **Efficiency and Productivity**: Teams can focus on high-impact tasks, driving productivity and job satisfaction.
- **Customer Value Growth**: Users have reported improved sales and customer acquisition through the technology’s enhancements.
- **Cost Competitiveness**: By automating and optimizing logistics, businesses can significantly lower their operational costs.
- **Data-Driven Insights**: The platform generates valuable data that helps businesses make informed decisions.

### Trust and Community:
Freterium has garnered the trust of numerous clients across various sectors, including significant players like Danone, Jumia, and Mondelez. With over 1,000 shippers, 3PLs, and distributors as part of its community, Freterium emphasizes a shared commitment to world-class logistics practices.

If you’re interested in exploring how Freterium can enhance your logistics operations, you can [book a demo](https://www.freterium.com/request-demo).

With a focus on adaptability and future-proofing business logistics, Freterium is redefining transport management in an ever-evolving world. Visit their website at [freterium.com](https://www.freterium.com) for more information.
